channel.title: Auto Wood cutter *POWERCHOPPER*
channel.description:
Yes its finally here i have worked and worked on it since learning hot to script only last night i have made a few scripts i will be posting them all so i need you all to test my woodcutter. [br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 03:58:22 PM[/size][hr]Ok Got an update! Made it with a progress report so post your proggress reports plese!
ok i made it so all my new codes have been added it is an awsome script!
[size=30pt]I will Show you how to work the form untl it is fixed!!!!!!![/size]
passwordbox\\put password in this box Start \\press start after you have got user and pass entered Username userbox\\put username in this box Password
########################Added anti ban#############################
v1 normal power chopper v2 added form v3 added stat lookup (needs a bit of fixing) v4 added proggress report v5 added anti ban :) ****Coming soon*****
anti randoms need help find axe head and fix

item.title: Auto Wood cutter *POWERCHOPPER*
item.dc:creator: @reece844 reece844
item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

program PowerChopper;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const
tree1 = 3043432;
tree2 = 3041376;
axehandle = 874871;

var
frmDesign: TForm;
Username, Label1: TLabel;
Edit1, Edit2: TEdit;
Button1: TButton;

loads: integer;
Username1, Password1: string;

procedure SetupAll;
begin
Username1 := Edit1.Text;
Password1 := Edit2.Text;
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
WriteLn(‘You have clicked the button’);
frmDesign.Caption := frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult := mrOk;
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 696;
frmDesign.Height := 480;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘User and Pass Saver’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Username := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Username.Parent := frmDesign;
Username.Left := 83;
Username.Top := 111;
Username.Width := 111;
Username.Height := 29;
Username.Caption := ‘Username’;
Username.Font.Color := clWindowText;
Username.Font.Height := -24;
Username.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Username.Font.Style := [];
Username.ParentFont := False;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 86;
Label1.Top := 152;
Label1.Width := 107;
Label1.Height := 29;
Label1.Caption := ‘Password’;
Label1.Font.Color := clWindowText;
Label1.Font.Height := -24;
Label1.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Label1.Font.Style := [];
Label1.ParentFont := False;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 209;
Edit1.Top := 116;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 27;
Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit2.Left := 93;
Edit2.Top := 62;
Edit2.Width := 121;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 9
Edit2.PasswordChar := ‘*’;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Button1.Left := 79;
Button1.Top := 99;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Start!’;
Button1.TabOrder := 10;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure findtree;
begin
repeat
if (FindColorSpiral(x, y, tree1, msx1, msy1, msx2, msy2)) then
mmouse(x, y, 3, 3)
until (istextat(9, 9, ‘Tree’))
if (istextat(9, 9, ‘Tree’)) then
begin
mouse(x, y, 2, 2, true)
wait(4000 + random(300))
loads := loads + 1;
end;
end;

procedure dropit;
begin
dropto(2, 28); // change the 2 to 3 if you have two axes or 24 if you have 3 axes
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(‘Progress Report for Reeces POWERCHOPPER’);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(‘Chopped and Dropped ’ + inttostr(loads) + ’ loads.’);
WriteLn(’ ');
WriteLn(‘Made by Reece’)
end;

procedure randomskill; //to make more random of the hover skill.
begin
case random(20) + 1 of
1: HoverSkill(‘woodcutting’, false)
4: HoverSkill(‘woodcutting’, false)
7: HoverSkill(‘woodcutting’, false)
9: HoverSkill(‘woodcutting’, false)
11: HoverSkill(‘woodcutting’, false)
16: HoverSkill(‘woodcutting’, false)
18: HoverSkill(‘woodcutting’, false)
20: HoverSkill(‘woodcutting’, false)
end;
end;

begin
ClearDebug;
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
WriteLn('Username = ’ + Username1);
Writeln('Password = ’ + Password1);
SetupSRL;
repeat
repeat
if (invfull) then
break;
findtree;
RandomSkill;
until (invfull)
dropall;
RandomSkill;
until (false)
end.

Read full topic
